Bone daggers can be bought from Nardok's Bone Weapons in the Dorgeshuun Mines outside Dorgesh-Kaan for 2,000 coins. They can also be poisoned.

Its stats are the same as those of the iron dagger.

Combat styles[edit | edit source]

A player performing the bone dagger's special attack, Backstab.
Category: Stab SwordCombat StyleStyle typeWeapon StyleExperienceInvisible Boost
StabStabAccurateAttack and Hitpoints+3 Attack
LungeStabAggressiveStrength and Hitpoints+3 Strength
SlashSlashAggressiveStrength and Hitpoints+3 Strength
BlockStabDefensiveDefence and Hitpoints+3 Defence

Special attack[edit | edit source]

The bone dagger has a special attack, Backstab, (75%) which has a guaranteed hit if you weren't the last one to attack the target, and lowers the target's Defence by the amount of damage dealt, similar to the Bandos godsword's and Dorgeshuun crossbow's special attacks. Note that a successful Backstab can still deal 0 damage, as a guaranteed hit is not the same as guaranteed damage. This is because Backstab guarantees a success on the hit accuracy roll, but does not guarantee an above-zero value on the hit damage roll.

The special attack can only be used after completing the Death to the Dorgeshuun quest, but it can be wielded and poisoned without completing the quest.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The position of the weapon and its variants on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Bone dagger (+)" to "Bone dagger (p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Bone dagger (s)" to "Bone dagger (p++)".

Its stats are the same as those of the [[iron dagger]].

==Combat styles==
[[File:Backstab.gif|250px|thumb|A player performing the bone dagger's special attack, ''Backstab''.]]
{{CombatStyles|Stab Sword}}

==Special attack==
The bone dagger has a [[special attack]], ''Backstab'', (75%) which has a guaranteed hit if you weren't the last one to attack the target, and lowers the target's [[Defence]] by the amount of damage dealt, similar to the [[Bandos godsword]]'s and [[Dorgeshuun crossbow]]'s special attacks. Note that a successful ''Backstab'' can still deal 0 damage, as a guaranteed hit is not the same as guaranteed damage. This is because ''Backstab'' guarantees a success on the hit accuracy roll, but does not guarantee an above-zero value on the hit damage roll.

The special attack can only be used after completing the [[Death to the Dorgeshuun]] [[quest]], but it can be wielded and poisoned without completing the quest.
